# maantrack [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/pravin-raha/maantrack.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/pravin-raha/maantrack) [![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-brightgreen.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)
Simple task tracking application

## How to run on dev machine

```sbtshell
sbt run
```

Paste this url to see swagger docs

[http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui/index.html](http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui/index.html)

Heroku url

[https://maantrack.herokuapp.com/swagger-ui/index.html](https://maantrack.herokuapp.com/swagger-ui/index.html)
